thread.title: James Crampton
thread.title_full: Marbles: the Brain Store reviewed by James Crampton

author: James Crampton
title: James Crampton
text: Ordered board game on sale through online site and received confirmation and pending deduct from PayPal on 1/5/17... 24 hours later the order was canceled by Marbles without explanation 1/6/17. Transaction is still showing as pending and affecting my PayPal balance as of 1/17/17.... Sent multiple requests to customer service for clarification/ pending payment removal with no replies....
